metadata.title: CVE-2019-10052 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. If the network packet does nothave the right length, the parser tries to access a part of a DHCP packet.At this point, the Rust environment runs into a panic inparse_clientid_option in the dhcp/parser.rs file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.4-1').
